title: What's a good, simple note-taking app for my tablet? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thank you for askimg this. Ironically, Quora moderators do not allow normally allow anyone to share word about a product they sell. But I can tell you this much. I'm an Android Developer and my Organizer for Ultimate Mobility Note Taking is very easy to find on the Google Play Store. Simply search for my name as the Developer By typing: Alexander Madani My note taking app has a Free version (which will be retiring soon and I don't recommend). But I also sell a Pro Paid version of my App…which is currently on sale for Free. So if you're using Android, check out my easy notes Organizer. I think you will like it. If you tried it and liked it…please help me share word about with others. And also kindly take a moment to provide my ongoing development efforts and costs…your awesome Stars and Feedback on our play store. Thank you so much Alexander Madani

I would suggest two note taking apps. Its SusuNote: notepad , todolist and memo - Apps on Google Play and his alternative one JeNote: Notepad, to-do list, voice memo and notes - Apps on Google Play. Hope they fit your taste.
